title: 3M Nears Deal to Combine Food-Safety Unit With Neogen; The deal, structured as an RMT, values the combined company at $9.3 billion including debt
text:
Neogen, based in Lansing, Mich., has a market value of $4.3 billion, while 3M's is around $100 billion.

Write to Cara Lombardo at cara.lombardo@wsj.com and Patrick Thomas at Patrick.Thomas@wsj.com

3M Nears Deal to Combine Food-Safety Unit With Neogen
